entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain or light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
